context: Have you seen Steel Magnolias (1989) ? I cry every time. Love it

several generations of women and their trials. Terms of Endearment (1983) is similar.

resp: Or are you more into action movies? We like Flicka (2006) A story about a girl and a horse. We also enjoyed War Horse (2011) The animation of the horse is so lifelike
